description:
Discharge of conditions LR61 and LR61b (Land Contamination) of Arsenal Lough Road Development (P011501). 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:- 

 1.  Design Note and structural specifications for     excavation, April 2002. 2.  Method Statement (Contaminated Ground Operations),     June 2002. 3.  Weeks Consulting Grounds Investigation Report,     October 2001. 4.  Stats Phase 2 Geo-environmental Report, L.R.East,     May 2002. 5.  Stats Site Investigation Report for Prop. Access Road.     Lough Road, May 2002. 6.  Pell Frishman Geo-technical and Geo-environmental     Desk Study, June 2002 and August 2002 Addendum. 7.  Babtie - Geo-environmental Report - Holloway Road,     Sainsburys - December 2000. 8.  Fellows International Ltd. - A Desk Study:     Risk Assessment, Environmental Munitions Contamination     Ashburton Grove, Lough Road and Blundell Street Sites -     September 2001.
